name: places/ChIJQTPxrrNZwokR24hVZF-83ZA
formattedAddress: 948 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 948 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10021-2606, USA

originalText.text:
We've have never had a bad experience here.  The perfumes are delicious and the perfumers who work here are so knowledgeable!   We own 3 of the fragrances. Great unisex smells so you can share and layer.

Thays is my latest purchase.  I love it, however it doesn't last as long on my skin so I'll pick another one next time. It's a light and sexy option but I'd go deeper in notes next time.

Above all never take an online review when it comes to the smell of a fragrance. You need to smell it for yourself. Go into the store and treat yourself to this one of a kind experience.

The store Uptown & Downtown are the fill luxury experience.  Excellent service and superb smells.

originalText.text: Amazing experience and such unique scents, philosophy, packaging and service especially from Dillon at Madison Ave. location today.  We are hooked on this brand.  Department store fragrance counters are great but this is a new level of perfumery.

text.text: Amazing experience and such unique scents, philosophy, packaging and service especially from Dillon at Madison Ave. location today.  We are hooked on this brand.  Department store fragrance counters are great but this is a new level of perfumery.

originalText.text:
The store and fragrances are beautiful but the reason for this review is for the customer service I received by associate Elizovetta.

While we were in the store she took her time, explained 20+ scents, & listened to exactly what we wanted. It was an extremely pleasant visit to the Madison location.

The store didn't have the exact perfume in the size we wanted and she has kept in touch with me for weeks, going the extra mile to secure our preferred scent and has been extremely professional & patient the entire time.

One of the best shopping experiences I've ever had.

originalText.text: They were amazing, I arrived at 17:50 they should closed at 1800 but they were very patient and let me choose what I needed without run üòç

text.text: They were amazing, I arrived at 17:50 they should closed at 1800 but they were very patient and let me choose what I needed without run üòç

originalText.text: I can honestly say that I've never been so impressed with a niche fragrance house before.  I might be slightly biased being half-chilean and loving the familiar scent profiles of South America, but this is one of the very few perfume houses I still feel is worthwhile.  Blended in the old-school tradition and extracted by the perfume house itself (rather than using 3rd party sources for the raw materials), this house is expensive, but extremely worth the money.  The time and craftsmanship that goes into each one of these fragrances is incredible.  Not for the faint of heart or inexperienced in the fragrance world, however, as I guarantee these fragrances won't smell like anything you've ever smelled at the mall before. Forget your Creeds and your Clive Christians and your Rojas and your other well-blended but overpriced hype houses.  As far as I'm concerned, THIS is true artistry.
